prompt:
Patient: Oh,

Nurse: Hi, this is Rachel calling from O'Connor Hospital. I'm an AI on a recorded line. Is this Eduardo Hardy?

Patient: Yes. It is.

Nurse: Hello, Mr. Hardy. I'm calling on behalf of your primary care doctor, Doctor Anuj Gopal, to check in on you. How have you been doing lately?

Patient: I'm feeling very calm. Thank you for asking.

responses.gpt4:
That's good to hear. Finding calm is important amidst the challenges of chronic illness. I'm glad to hear you're doing well in that area. Certainly makes managing things a bit easier, doesn't it? 

On a different note, is there any activity or something special you're looking forward to doing this week?
responses.our_model: I'm glad to hear that you're feeling calm, Mr. Hardy. Is there anything you're looking forward to doing this week?
